articles.title: House Speaker Johnson Joins Republicans Pressing for Transparency on Epstein Case
articles.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson has joined a growing number of Republicans urging the Trump administration to release more information regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case, highlighting a divide within the party over the issue.

articles.title: Pentagon Orders Removal of 2,000 National Guard Troops from Los Angeles
articles.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has ordered the withdrawal of 2,000 National Guard troops deployed in Los Angeles following protests over immigration raids, citing a decrease in lawlessness in the city.

articles.title: Supreme Court Clears Way for Trump to Dismantle Education Department
articles.description: The U.S. Supreme Court has ruled that President Trump can proceed with dismantling the Education Department without congressional approval, a decision that has sparked concerns about the future of federal education programs.
